name: CbcCountRowCut
brief: Reference-counted row cuts with ownership tracking

algorithms.name:
Reference-Counted Cuts with Hash Deduplication
Copyright (C) 2002, IBM Corporation and others. All Rights Reserved.
This code is licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License (EPL).

CbcCountRowCut: OsiRowCut with reference counting for memory management.
Tracks which nodes use the cut and auto-deletes when count reaches zero.

Bookkeeping:
- numberPointingToThis_: Reference count
- owner_/ownerCut_: Back-pointer to creating node
- whichCutGenerator_: ID of generator (+10000 if global)

Usage pattern:
- Increment when child nodes inherit the cut
- Decrement when cut becomes loose or node is fathomed
- Delete when count reaches zero

CbcRowCuts: Collection class for cuts with hash-based deduplication.
Prevents duplicate cuts from being added multiple times.
